title: Outsight
description: Outsight, noun [out-sahyt]: the ability to see and understand external things clearly.  Our objective is to make LiDAR-based Spatial Intelligence become Plug & Play, so it can be used by application developers, in any market.  Our customers are Builders of Smart Machines (ie Mobile robots and Vehicles) and Infrastructure-based solution providers that monitor the flow of People, Goods or Vehicles (ie. Smart Cities, Industry, Road Safety, Logistics, Security & Surveillanceâ€¦).  Professional Integrators, OEMs and Solution providers can build differentiating applications based on any LiDAR without needing to deal with the complexity of low-level 3D processing and interfacing with multiple LiDAR products.
